term.title: stepwise reaction

item.text: A chemical reaction with at least one reaction intermediate and involving at least two consecutive elementary reactions.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1167 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
